definition: (old) third person singular pronoun ("he" or "she")/second person singular pronoun ("you")/(May 4th period) third person singular feminine pronoun ("she")/(Classical Chinese) introductory particle with no specific meaning/that (preceding a noun)
surname Yi/abbr. for 伊拉克[Yi1 la1 ke4], Iraq/abbr. for 伊朗[Yi1 lang3], Iran
Guardian Council of the Constitution of Iran

sentences.english: Russia says that Iran and North Korea do not have missiles capable of striking Europe.
sentences.chinese: 俄羅斯說，伊朗和北韓沒有掌握可以打擊歐洲的導彈。

sentences.english: This month Iran arrested several more bloggers.
sentences.chinese: 本月伊朗又逮捕了多名博主。

sentences.english: He is due to be formally inaugurated in front of parliament on Wednesday.
sentences.chinese: 艾哈邁迪內賈德星期三將在伊朗議會上正式就任總統。

sentences.english: The Bahá'í Faith is currently the largest religious minority in Iran.
sentences.chinese: 巴哈伊教是目前伊朗最大的少數派宗教。

sentences.english: Greeting with Iranian, you need to address their surname with their academic or job title.
sentences.chinese: 和伊朗人打招呼，要稱他們的姓加上學術或職務頭銜。

sentences.english: State media reported that Shahram Amiri was asking for a quick return to Tehran.
sentences.chinese: 伊朗國家媒體報導說，阿米里要求迅速返回德黑蘭。

sentences.english: A city of southwest-central Iran south-southeast of Tehran.
sentences.chinese: 設拉子伊朗中西南部一城市，在德黑蘭西南偏南。

sentences.english: It also shows the Iranian authorities that people care and won't let them be forgotten," said Laura Fattal, mother of Josh Fattal.
sentences.chinese: 同時表明人民關心的伊朗當局不會讓他們被遺忘”。

sentences.english: Bin Laden daughter hides in Saudi embassy in Iran.
sentences.chinese: 拉登女兒擺脫伊朗軟禁，躲入沙特大使館。

sentences.english: Bush, "and our view is we want the Iranian people to flourish."
sentences.chinese: 而我們的觀點是，我們想讓伊朗人民過上富足的生活。

sentences.english: Qatar beat Iran78-61 in the round-robin portion of the tournament.
sentences.chinese: 卡塔爾在小組賽曾以78比61打敗伊朗。

sentences.english: Source Galbanum is an umbelliferous plant that grows in Iran and Afghanistan.
sentences.chinese: 白松香是傘形科植物，長於伊朗和阿富汗。

sentences.english: "The last thing Iran wants to see is a permanent American presence in its backyard," says Aslan.
sentences.chinese: 伊朗最不想看到的是美國在其後院永久的存在。

sentences.english: And I think U.S.-Iran relations can have a serious impact on the way things go.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲，美國和伊朗的關係會嚴重影響局勢發展。

sentences.english: VOA Director Dan Austin has rejected Iran's accusations.
sentences.chinese: 美國之音臺長奧斯汀駁斥了伊朗的指責。

sentences.english: There have been a number of accidents involving Iranian planes over the past few years.
sentences.chinese: 過去幾年伊朗有多起事故都因飛機引起。

definition: United Arab Emirates/abbr. for 阿拉伯联合酋长国
nations of the Persian Gulf/Gulf states
